title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2018 Dogecoin Bar by bigtimespaghettiOriginal thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2875815STARTING BID: 0.0015BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 30th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Okay went to the link trying to understand what this bar is made of. what does it weigh.From what I read it is 2oz of .999 silver.but there are more than one bar and some are made differently.so can I get a confirmation that this is supposed to be 2 oz troy .999 silver.if it is the 2 oz troy silver .999 bar I will bid 0.0015 btc.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on November 26, 2023, 04:30:19 PMOkay went to the link trying to understand what this bar is made of. what does it weigh.From what I read it is 2oz of .999 silver.but there are more than one bar and some are made differently.so can I get a confirmation that this is supposed to be 2 oz troy .999 silver.if it is the 2 oz troy silver .999 bar I will bid 0.0015 btc.This is not silver... just silver platedThe pure silver bars are clearly marked with a stamp that says "2oz .999 fine silver much purity!"

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on November 27, 2023, 12:18:21 PMQuote from: philipma1957 on November 26, 2023, 04:30:19 PMOkay went to the link trying to understand what this bar is made of. what does it weigh.From what I read it is 2oz of .999 silver.but there are more than one bar and some are made differently.so can I get a confirmation that this is supposed to be 2 oz troy .999 silver.if it is the 2 oz troy silver .999 bar I will bid 0.0015 btc.This is not silver... just silver platedThe pure silver bars are clearly marked with a stamp that says "2oz .999 fine silver much purity!"okayI will still bid 0.0015 as it is attractive. even though it is silverplate0.0015 philipma1957thanks for clarifying this for me.
